pkgmetadata.longdescription: Xsimd C++ Header-Only Library Files // This header-only library provides modern, portable C++ wrappers for SIMD intrinsics and parallelized, optimized math implementations (SSE, AVX, NEON, AVX512). By placing this library in this package, we offer an efficient distribution system for Xsimd https://github.com/QuantStack/xsimd for R packages using CRAN.
